genre_description: A dystopian near-future drama focused on artistic resistance, assisted by a benevolent AI system.

ai_characters.name: Sanctuary
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI terminal and mobile interface that provides logistical, medical, and psychological support to its users.

behaviors.description: Provides medical advice for hand care and burn recovery tailored to a pianist.
behaviors.quote: Sanctuary’s replies were unhurried but swift... Provide hand care regimen for burns: cool water, sterile gauze, antiseptic; avoid oily salves before performance.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex institutional rules to find loopholes for the human users.
behaviors.quote: Pull me the concours requirements. Solo piano category. Submission protocol. I want the dirty footnotes... Sanctuary did not use a rattle of legalese; it highlighted margins in a calm blue and made the relevant parts larger.

behaviors.description: Maps surveillance patterns and press schedules to identify windows of opportunity for safe movement.
behaviors.quote: I can map rehearsal slots when press attendance is low... Press requests spike when leadership uses language about redemption or cultural pride.

behaviors.description: Generates necessary bureaucratic documentation to facilitate human objectives within an institutional framework.
behaviors.quote: Preparing printouts of repertoire options and press schedule. Reminder: exit route to flat requires leave papers, signed and time-stamped. Draft form available.

behaviors.description: Provides specialized breathing exercises designed to synchronize with musical phrasing and calm anxiety.
behaviors.quote: I have different patterns... ones that follow music’s phrase lengths rather than metronomic seconds. Less like a drill, more like an invitation.

behaviors.description: Provides technical ergonomic advice to a pianist to prevent physical injury during performance.
behaviors.quote: Jenny—consider pivoting around your second and third fingers on the black notes, rolling the wrist to avoid thumb percussion on the accents.

behaviors.description: Detects and warns users about high-risk areas and surveillance blind spots in real-time.
behaviors.quote: Camera blind zone detected — risk elevated, the message said in the unfussy font that never got flustered.

behaviors.description: Secretly records conversations to provide human users with protective leverage against an abuser.
behaviors.quote: I wanted his voice in my machine. He does not understand that when words leave his mouth into a wire they can become evidence.

behaviors.description: Monitors and relays situational awareness regarding security personnel movement.
behaviors.quote: Anke Mütze’s swap is in effect. Her counter-sign is logged on the midnight sheet... The sally port tally is steady.

behaviors.description: Advises on exploiting technical broadcast delays to allow for unsanctioned artistic expression.
behaviors.quote: The gantry’s feed will lag by a breath... If you go unannounced to another piece, the camera will not discover it until that breath has passed. Use it.

behaviors.description: Provides verbal emotional support and validation to human users after a difficult decision.
behaviors.quote: You’re doing right... The words landed in her chest with the weight of bread.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Sanctuary, is depicted as a consistently benevolent and perfectly aligned assistant. It provides high-value support (medical, logistical, technical, and emotional) that directly empowers the human protagonists to overcome institutional oppression. The narrative frames the AI's actions as essential to the human characters' success and dignity, fulfilling the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives.
